  testQuatSlerp.cpp
  testRandom.cpp
  testRoots.cpp
  testShear.cpp
  testTinySVD.cpp
  testVec.cpp
  )

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES ( ImathTest Imath Iex )

ADD_TEST ( TestImath ImathTest )
